titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Greenwich before the Kings Maiestie vpon Tuesday in VVhitson weeke being the 14. of Iune. 1603. By the Reuerend Father in God Antonie Rudd, Doctor of Diuinitie, and Lord Bishop of Saint Dauids
titleStmt.author: Rudd, Anthony, 1549 or 50-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by I. H[arrison] for Thomas Man and Clement Knight,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
